Package com.hexaware.dao

Interface GalleryDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
GalleryDaoImpl
public interface GalleryDao
Interface defining operations for managing Galleries.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addGallery(Gallery gallery)
    Adds a new Gallery to the system.
    boolean
    removeGallery(int galleryId)
    Removes a Gallery from the system by its ID.
    List<Gallery>
    searchGalleries(String keyword)
    Searches for Galleries based on a keyword.
    boolean
    updateGallery(Gallery gallery)
    Updates an existing Gallery in the system.

  • Method Details

    • addGallery

      boolean addGallery(Gallery gallery)
      Adds a new Gallery to the system.
      Parameters:
      gallery - The Gallery object to be added.
      Returns:
      True if the addition is successful, otherwise false.

    • updateGallery

      boolean updateGallery(Gallery gallery)
      Updates an existing Gallery in the system.
      Parameters:
      gallery - The Gallery object to be updated.
      Returns:
      True if the update is successful, otherwise false.

    • removeGallery

      boolean removeGallery(int galleryId)
      Removes a Gallery from the system by its ID.
      Parameters:
      galleryId - The ID of the Gallery to be removed.
      Returns:
      True if the removal is successful, otherwise false.

    • searchGalleries

      List<Gallery> searchGalleries(String keyword)
      Searches for Galleries based on a keyword.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The keyword to search for in Gallery names or descriptions.
      Returns:
      List of Galleries matching the keyword.
